alert.note: Alert for Benson; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:28PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Benson and southwestern Ramsey Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Minnewaukan, or 13 miles west of Devils Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lakewood Park and Camp Grafton around 1255 PM CDT. Devils Lake around 100 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
